statements: SELECT * FROM food_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM food_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_location FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT * FROM food_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('Indoor', 'Outdoor') ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor' AND activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_location FROM food_activities WHERE activity_location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY activity_name;
SELECT * FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('Indoor', 'Social') AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY activity_name, activity_date;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type IS NULL OR activity_type = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY activity_location, activity_name;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM food_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Indoor' AND activity_location != 'Home' ORDER BY activity_date ASC, activity_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, date_scheduled FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT instructor_name, capacity FROM CookingClasses WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Tastings WHERE participant_limit <= 20;
SELECT tasting_name, tasting_date, location FROM Tastings ORDER BY tasting_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, capacity FROM CookingClasses WHERE date_scheduled >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CookingClasses WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY date_scheduled DESC
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM CookingClasses WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'Chef%'
SELECT * FROM Tastings WHERE location = 'Wine Cellar' ORDER BY tasting_date ASC
SELECT class_name, date_scheduled, capacity FROM CookingClasses WHERE capacity < 15
SELECT tasting_name, tasting_date, participant_limit FROM Tastings WHERE tasting_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CookingClasses ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM CookingClasses WHERE class_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT tourist_name, tourist_country FROM Tourists WHERE tourist_country = 'Italy';
SELECT tasting_location, tasting_date FROM Tastings ORDER BY tasting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tourists
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT tourist_name, tourist_country FROM Tourists WHERE tourist_country = 'Italy';
SELECT tasting_location, tasting_date FROM Tastings ORDER BY tasting_date DESC;
SELECT tourist_name, tourist_email FROM Tourists WHERE tourist_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT class_name, class_description, instructor_name, class_date FROM CookingClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, chef_name FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT tasting_name, tasting_location, tasting_date FROM Tastings WHERE tasting_type = 'Wine Tasting';
SELECT tourist_name, nationality, age FROM Tourists ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT class_name, chef_name, max_capacity FROM CookingClasses WHERE max_capacity >= 10;
SELECT r.registration_id, r.registration_date, c.class_name, t.tourist_name FROM Registration r JOIN CookingClasses c ON r.class_id = c.class_id JOIN Tourists t ON r.tourist_id = t.tourist_id;
SELECT * FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT class_name, chef_name, class_date FROM CookingClasses WHERE max_capacity > 10;
SELECT class_name, chef_name FROM CookingClasses WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT tasting_name, tasting_location, tasting_type FROM Tastings ORDER BY tasting_date DESC;
SELECT tourist_name, nationality, age FROM Tourists WHERE nationality = 'French';
SELECT * FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT chef_name, COUNT(*) FROM CookingClasses GROUP BY chef_name;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT tasting_name, location, tasting_date FROM Tastings ORDER BY tasting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CookingClasses WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, chef_name FROM CookingClasses WHERE chef_name = 'Jamie Oliver';
SELECT class_name, chef_name FROM CookingClasses ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT chef_name FROM CookingClasses;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants JOIN CookingClasses ON Participants.class_id = CookingClasses.class_id WHERE CookingClasses.class_name = 'Italian Cooking';
